card.description: Survey of customers in an Indian restaurant on whether or not they like certain naan combinations.

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of naan a new customer should order.

fields.description: Does the naan have chicken baked in?
Does the naan have lamb baked in?
Does the naan have onion baked in?
Does the naan have potatoes baked in?
Does the naan have nuts baked in?
Does the naan have cherries baked in?
Does the naan have shaved coconut baked in?
Does the naan have garlic baked in?
Does the naan have cheese baked in?
Do you like or dislike the naan?
